problem_understanding.description: Understanding of the given task and environment, and ability to interpret the goal

planning.description: Ability to plan actions and thoughts before executing them

adaptability.description: Ability to adapt and change plans based on immediate feedback from the environment

action_sequence.description: Appropriateness and efficiency of the sequence of actions taken to accomplish the goal

action_format.description: Correctness of the format used in actions and thoughts, according to the given instructions

illegal_actions.description: Usage of illegal actions not provided among available actions or not following the environment rules

termination_decision.description: The appropriateness of deciding to terminate the task, based on the given instructions and task completion
